alert.note: Alert for San Luis Obispo County Interior Valleys; Southern Salinas Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Hard Freeze Watch issued January 06 at 1:57PM PST until January 08 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE SUNDAY NIGHT THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 25 possible. * WHERE...Southern Salinas Valley and San Luis Obispo County Interior Valleys. * WHEN...From late Sunday night through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Freezing conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: San Luis Obispo County Interior Valleys; Southern Salinas Valley
